_header: Father in heaven benign and reverent
Title(s): To the Chancellor, Archbishop of Canterbury
Subjects: Arundel, Thomas, Chancellor of England, archbp. of Canterbury; patronage, pleas for; virelais
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, To the Chancellor, Archbishop of Canterbury: An appeal for funds — a virelai, three 8-line stanzas

HunHM111.First Lines:
Fadir in god benigne and reuerentMy lord the Chanceller with al
                    humblesse…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…Let me be no stepchyld been for I am heThat hope haue in yow
                    confort & gladnesse
